title: How do I mark a message that TB (Windows) has put in the spam folder as not spam?
content: TB Windows puts some messages in my spam folder even though I've put the addresses in my contacts and told it to check contacts before moving them to spam folder. It would be nice if the "Spam" button became a "not Spam" button.
creator: aladdin2

title: Exporting email data
content: How I export yahoo email to a sortable format like Exel? I need the flexibility of sorting on different fields.

title: Links in Thunderbird emails
content:
When i receive email with linkages i am getting this reply when link is used


404 Not Found

The resource you are looking for has been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

We apologize for the inconvenience.
creator: gwb2

title: Reminders 4 hours late...
content:
Hi, my Thunderbird calendar reminders are coming up 4 hours after the meeting.

Running Kubuntu. System locale/timezone OK, TBird set to use system time (though manually making it the same didn't help). HW Clock matches system time. Pacific/Auckland.

Tried exporting all my appointments and re-importing them - no change.
creator: yard1

title: Trouble Adding Gmail to Thunderbird – Urgent Help Needed
content:
Hi All,

My name is Chris and I’ve been struggling for the past 3 days to add my Gmail account into Mozilla Thunderbird, and it’s become urgent. My computer often crashes and freezes, so I deleted my Gmail from an earlier version of Thunderbird and reinstalled the latest version.

When I try to add the account, Thunderbird just says “Looking up configuration of my Gmail” and never completes the setup. Oddly enough, I was able to add the same Gmail account into Outlook without any issues.

Is there something wrong with Thunderbird’s automatic server configuration for Gmail?

On top of that, I’d like to download all my past Gmail emails (sent items and inbox storage) into Thunderbird, but I don’t know the correct manual settings to use.

Any guidance on fixing the account setup and the proper manual IMAP/POP settings would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance, Chris
creator: chris.carragher1977

title: Archive removal
content: A large amount of archives adds unnecessary storage load. I want to move these out of my active files and onto a remote USB stick. How do I do this?
creator: peterdev
